scripts.test: NODE_ENV=production browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] spec/globalHeaderTest.js | uglifyjs > spec/compiledSpec.js
scripts.watch: watchify -v -d -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] main.js -o compiled.js
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 react ] ] main.js | uglifyjs > compiled.js | lessc assets/less/styles.less assets/css/styles.css | lessc --clean-css assets/less/styles.less assets/css/styles.min.css
